about_the_game:
Sonder : Lights of Little Tokyo is a short and casual 2D adventure game with beautiful hand-drawn pixel art. Explore Little Tokyo, meet bizarre characters, and complete quirky quests.

The Story

Play as Cyan, your average nobody on his little reunion with his childhood friends Lumence and Roberoth. When a series of unfortunate events unfold in Little Tokyo, the trio quickly find themselves stumbling into quirky quests and in the middle of people's complex lives.

"Everyone has a story to tell, each one as complex as ours."

Little Tokyo is filled with a ton of characters with interesting and brilliantly-written backstories. Meet, interact, and complete their favours. Then bask in the realization that everyone is living a life as vivid as ours.

Features :

  • Explore vibrant Little Tokyo at night filled with cyberpunk feels!
  • Meet peculiar people and discover their stories!
  • Solve bizarre mysteries!
  • Complete tons of sidequests!
  • Featuring chill Original Soundtracks!
